main_definition: A trainer is a person who teaches or instructs others in a particular skill, sport, or profession.

meanings_and_examples.example: The dog trainer taught the puppy to sit and stay using positive reinforcement techniques.
The personal trainer created a customized workout plan for his client to help her achieve her fitness goals.
The airline pilot used the flight simulator trainer to practice take-offs, landings, and emergency procedures before flying in real planes.
The basketball coach was a skilled trainer who helped the team improve their shooting techniques and game strategy.
The dance instructor taught her students various steps and routines for an upcoming performance.
